about.text1: I've been creating websites using HTML, CSS, Javascript and PHP since I was a teenager.
about.text2: In 2019, I took online courses to get professionally into website and mobile app development with Angular and Ionic.
about.text3: Since then I have worked as a freelancer for different companies.
about.text5: I am responsible for the further and new development of complex websites and mobile apps.
about.text6: My native language is German but I also speak good English and advanced Croatian.
about.text7: I am married and have a child.

vocabularyTrainer.text1: Web App for learning Croatian language. Made with Angular.
vocabularyTrainer.text2: Android App for learning Croatian language. Made with Angular and Ionic.

catchCups.text2: I worked on a mobile app that evaluates measurement data from an irrigation system for lawns. The app was made with Angular and Ionic.

webaro.text2: , I worked on the further development of a web app for the efficient planning and evaluation of drone data in the agricultural sector. Realized with Angular, on behalf of

jokes.text1: I wrote a book with jokes, in pairs of german and croatian language. You can read some of them when you login down here. You can create an account by yourself or just use
jokes.text4: There is also a form for ordering the book using the
jokes.text6: But because this is only a demonstration website you can not really order the book with this form. If you want to try out the functionality just enter any address, one of the following test cards provided from the stripe service to simulate a payment.
jokes.text7: Then any future date as expiration and any 3-digit number as CVC.
jokes.text8: If you really want to read my book, you can order it on amazon with
